contentrichtext.text: '''Only When I Laugh''' may refer to: * [[Only When I Laugh (film)|''Only When I Laugh'' (film)]], a 1981 film based on Neil Simon's play ''The Gingerbread Lady'' * [[Only When I Laugh (TV series)|''Only When I Laugh'' (TV series)]], a 1970s British sitcom * [[Only When I Laugh (play)|''Only When I Laugh'' (play)]], a play based on the sitcom by [[Eric Chappell]] * [[Only When I Laugh (book)|''Only When I Laugh'' (book)]], a book by Jim Backus and [[Henny Backus]] ==See also== * ''[[Only When I Larf]]'', a 1968 novel by Len Deighton * [[Only When I Larf (film)|''Only When I Larf'' (film)]], a 1968 adaptation of Deighton's novel * ''[[It Only Hurts When I Laugh]]'', an album by Jann Browne {{disambig}}
